website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers GORun Vortex is a running shoe that anyone can wear because of its prime features that enhance performance and overall comfort. Though it received mixed reviews from the users, it is still safe to say that the GORun Vortex is a good shoe. This neutral running shoe is great for daily trainings and other athletic activities.
pros: Utilizes a two-mesh fabric that is woven together for a stronger upper
The GORun Vortex has a comfortable fit that many reviewers welcomed
This running shoe continues the Skechers trend of offering many color choices
The medium width of this shoe accommodates many shoe types without making it feel too tight or loose
The durability of the shoe is impressive
Runners who have tried this have sensed a more responsive underfoot cushioning because of the features present in it
The Skechers Vortex has a moderate weight
cons: There were reviewers who felt uncomfortable with the flat arch of this shoe
There were those who complained about it not being consistent with its length, which seemed to run large
The mid-sole is directly exposed to the ground and the protective outsole layer isn’t placed in crucial areas where abrasion is usually found

customer_reviews.title: ALREADY FALLING APART
customer_reviews.text: We loved this men's Skecher sneaker, and bought it in Black as well as the Grey. But after just a few weeks of hardly any wearing, the fabric separated from the synthetic near the seam (see picture). The shoes are practically new, and we are extremely disappointed. We would like Amazon to replace this pair!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sheriwhalen

customer_reviews.title: Oh how I loved these at first
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet so I wear out shoes quickly. I also have issues with my feet hurting with shoes that don't offer much support. At first I loved these shoes as they were quite comfortable. So much that I would have bought another pair when these wore out. I could walk all days in these and my feet wouldn't hurt. However the other day the right shoe started to feel like is was slipping sideways on my foot. Like my foot was rolling in the shoe. It is a bit annoying but not enough to make me hate them. That is why they only get a 4. Still, the one issue may not stop me from buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Super cushy & stylish
customer_reviews.text: Used to wear 4 pairs of Adidas pureboost shoes for over 4 years. Tried these on and instantly found the feeling to be almost that of the Pureboost but with better arch support. Instantly fell in love with these and better yet found Amazon has them 14 bucks cheaper. Would buy again anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Deluxion

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Broken within three months. See the pictures. Really disappointed in quality. The third sketchers I own. The other two were great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Love

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad. He had a pair. He's the type of person who when they find something they really like, they want to buy more of that product, so I had to look up the model of shoe and luckily Amazon had the exact same pair down to the color. He likes this pair because this model is a bit wider in the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Divina Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: the shoe is crap
customer_reviews.text: less then 4 weeks of wear and the seams have ripped on the top of both shoes the cloth ripped at the welded seams don't recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Mike Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these, but they fell apart in six months. Pieces of fabric are coming off the top of both, and the sole is becoming detached from one shoe. They don’t get daily use, this is the first time I’ve seen a pair of Skechers not even last a full year.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart in first month
customer_reviews.text: exact same thing as other reviewer, bought on may 1st delivered on may 10th lasted till june 11th 2 days after end of return time, material came apart from leather or plastic toe covering as seen in there added picture. Now have no return option
customer_reviews.author: Loretta S.

customer_reviews.title: Its very comfortble.
customer_reviews.text: Its the best sneaker that I have purchased for my daily walking, you dont feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur R Eisele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for wide width and nice cushion
customer_reviews.text: It's all about fit. Skechers are my go to brand for my legs. If it does not fit, it does not mean it's bad but you need to look somewhere. Use Amazon try and buy
customer_reviews.author: Udayakiran

customer_reviews.title: Developed a hole in the left shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Easy to put on. But developed a hole on the inside of the left show. A coworker of my has the same shoes and they also got a hole in the same place. Must be a defect. Probably won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jaxson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a comfortable shoe to work in I'm on my feet for 9 hours a day they feel great almost like walking on clouds thanx
customer_reviews.author: ThealmightyD

customer_reviews.title: I love Sketchers shoes but this pair is too short and narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The product says it is size 12 but it is shorter than my other 2 pairs of Sketchers that are also size 12. In addition, this one is narrower than the other sketchers I have. I love the shoe but can't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Quality running shoe for an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for an excellent price. Very good cushioning in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: hgm1956

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit my feet better than any other walking/running shoe I've tried. The soles are pretty soft so they wear down fairly fast (15-20 miles per week), so I ordered another pair. Great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe... Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much only buy sketchers shoes. This one was a little quality than I'm used to getting but overall it's a decent shoe.
customer_reviews.author: sonystyle44

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: You just can't go wrong with Skechers!. These are exactly the true to size. They came earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wynette Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great Feel, good price!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. A bit wide but not much at all. Good shoe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Krevitz

customer_reviews.title: Good value, low quality for skechers
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes for the price, but it's not high quality, it doesn't work for training, and the red part doesn't always look right. And they look narrower than the picture
customer_reviews.author: Alex Yordi

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes runs a little bit large, but not loose, totally acceptable to me. It provides good support for running too. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bon0410

customer_reviews.title: one piece tongue
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits well .Did not know that it fits like a slip-on shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Sheeley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT a running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The soles on these shoes, although thick, are dense and offer virtually no absorption and they have absolutely no cushion. They are okay for walking.
customer_reviews.author: hazdev

customer_reviews.title: FEEL GREAT
customer_reviews.text: FEEL GREAT. EASY TO SLIP ON IF YOU LIKE YOUR FEET BREATH WELL WITH SHOE
customer_reviews.author: ALLEN  KIMBALL

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderfu! Whoever had the idea of putting a yoga mat in a shoe should be awarded a Nobel Prize of some type.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne L Creviston

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are amazingly comfortable and really helped my back and feet while walking long distances
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pair for my family. they told me the shoes were very very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anny

customer_reviews.title: Not a running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these direct from Skechers website. These are definitely not running shoes. There isn’t much support and the construction is pretty flimsy. They do look good, fit well and are fine for casual wear. But have no expectations of any true athletic activity while wearing. I attempted twice to post a similar review on the Skechers website, but they have not published.
customer_reviews.author: stefanie goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine, except the quality. The front fabric/mezz was very bad quality, after only a dozen times of uses, it started to tear... I onlybused it on weekends for going around the town, just pure walking normal road...
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kann

product_meta.title: Skechers 54841-SKECHERS-GORUN-VORTEX-STORM Running Shoes Men 40
feature_bullets: Skechers Air Cooled Goga Mat insole for maximum comfort
